name: Pirates Bounty
overview: Pirates Bounty is a role playing adventure game set in the Caribbean. You are to invade the islands, pillage the towns and build up a Pirate Army. This game is in early access, and will feature more maps and an more elaborate story. This game is for the Commodore Amiga 1200. It was developed in AMOS Professional 2.00, on a Real Commodore Amiga 1200 for the PTBOGameJam 04, during the 32 hours Game Jam, then polished during the week afterwards. This game can be played in an Amiga Emulator or on an actual Amiga.
